New Records: James Harden moved into No. 2 on NBA's career 3-point list with his 2,974th 3-pointer, surpassing Ray Allen.
Key Match Events: James Harden's history-making 3-pointer came with 6:09 left in the first quarter against the Utah Jazz.
Post-Match Reflections: Clippers coach Tyronn Lue commented on the extraordinary shooting abilities of both James Harden and Ray Allen.
